name: Snake: Full Circle
description:
Controls:

Keyboard: WASD/Arrow-keys, Game-pad: Joysticks or D-Pad for directional input. These can also be used in the main menu, but not the high score menu.

Mouse can be used for main menu and is the only option for navigating the high score menu. Keyboard in the high score menu to enter a name.

Escape key or Game-pad Start button while in a level to access high score menu.

Note: High scores may not be available in browser version.
